Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about working with Cloud Intelligence

General Questions

What makes Cloud Intelligence different from other software agencies?

Cloud Intelligence stands apart through our boutique approach combining unparalleled technical expertise with an artisan's philosophy. Our CEO James Burgess brings GCP certification and deep enterprise architecture experience, while our team of 8 elite professionals maintains uncompromising quality standards.

We treat software development as an art form, focusing on extracting value from the first keystroke while delivering solutions that scale effortlessly. Our track record includes processing $400M+ in transactions and serving 1M+ users across 100+ countries.

What is your company philosophy?

Our mission is simple: "To build an amazing software shop known for making the highest quality products in the world." We operate on five core values:

  • Correctness: Things must be done correctly, no exceptions
  • Quality: Highest standard quality in all deliverables
  • Value: Every action must extract business value
  • Craftsmanship: Approaching software development as an art form
  • Systems Thinking: Understanding and simplifying complex systems

Where is Cloud Intelligence located?

We are headquartered in Cape Town, South Africa, but operate as a remote-first company. This allows us to work with the best talent globally while serving clients primarily in international markets, especially the United States. Our remote-first approach enables us to deliver world-class solutions regardless of geographic boundaries.

Services & Expertise

What technologies and platforms do you specialize in?

Our core technology stack includes:

  • Languages: Python (primary), but we're language-agnostic based on project needs
  • Web Development: Django + Vue.js + Kubernetes + PostgreSQL for enterprise applications
  • Cloud Platforms: Cloud-agnostic approach with deep GCP experience (certified)
  • Data Engineering: Custom ETL pipelines, multi-source data integration, real-time synchronization
  • AI/ML: Generative AI implementation, document processing, business automation
  • Infrastructure: Kubernetes, cloud-native architectures, enterprise-grade security

What types of projects do you typically work on?

We specialize in complex, high-value enterprise projects including:

  • Healthcare Applications: HIPAA-compliant platforms like our Crossroads Health "Crossfire" application
  • Financial Services: Internal processing platforms and AI-powered document generators
  • Data Integration: Multi-system connectivity and real-time data synchronization
  • AI Solutions: Custom AI applications for business automation and document processing
  • Enterprise Web Applications: Scalable, secure platforms handling millions of users

Do you work with AI and machine learning?

Absolutely! Our team positions itself as "context engineers" with sharp AI skills. We have extensive experience in:

  • Generative AI implementation for business processes
  • AI-powered document processing and analysis
  • Custom AI chat applications (we're developing our own enterprise platform)
  • Machine learning integration for data analytics
  • AI automation for complex business workflows

We're currently developing a proprietary enterprise-grade private secure AI chat platform for public release.

Can you handle data engineering and analytics projects?

Data engineering is one of our core strengths. We excel at:

  • Custom ETL pipeline development with 2-hour refresh cycles
  • Multi-source data integration (10+ data sources in some projects)
  • Real-time data synchronization across platforms
  • Business intelligence dashboard creation (partnering with Metabase)
  • Processing large data volumes (8TB+ daily)

We're expanding our analytics services and plan to release one Metabase dashboard weekly from public data sources.

Project Process

What is your typical project timeline?

Project timelines vary based on complexity and scope, but our approach focuses on rapid value delivery:

  • Discovery Phase: 1-2 weeks for requirements analysis and architecture planning
  • MVP Development: 4-8 weeks for core functionality
  • Iterative Enhancement: Ongoing sprints with continuous value delivery
  • Enterprise Integration: Additional 2-4 weeks for complex system connectivity

We extract value from the first keystroke, ensuring you see progress and benefits immediately.

How do you ensure project quality and correctness?

Quality is non-negotiable at Cloud Intelligence. Our quality assurance includes:

  • Code Reviews: Every line of code is reviewed by senior engineers
  • Automated Testing: Comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end testing
  • Security Audits: Regular security assessments and compliance checks
  • Performance Monitoring: Continuous performance optimization and monitoring
  • Documentation: Thorough documentation for maintenance and scaling

We've maintained a zero-incident security record across all our healthcare and financial projects.

Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?

Yes, we offer comprehensive ongoing support including:

  • Technical Support: Rapid response to technical issues
  • System Monitoring: 24/7 monitoring for critical applications
  • Regular Updates: Security patches and feature enhancements
  • Scaling Support: Architecture adjustments as your business grows
  • Training: Team training for platform management

Our support approach focuses on building long-term partnerships rather than transactional relationships.

Pricing & Business

How do you structure your pricing?

Our pricing reflects our boutique, high-value approach:

  • Project-Based: Fixed-price contracts for well-defined scopes
  • Retainer Agreements: Monthly retainers for ongoing development and support
  • Value-Based Pricing: Pricing aligned with business value delivered
  • Hourly Consulting: For specialized consulting and advisory services

We focus on delivering exceptional ROI rather than competing on hourly rates. Every project is custom-quoted based on complexity and value delivered.

What is the typical investment for a project?

Project investments vary significantly based on scope and complexity:

  • Small Projects: $25,000 - $75,000 (MVP web applications, integrations)
  • Medium Projects: $75,000 - $200,000 (Enterprise platforms, data systems)
  • Large Projects: $200,000+ (Complex enterprise solutions, multi-system integration)
  • Ongoing Retainers: $10,000 - $30,000+ monthly

We provide detailed estimates after understanding your specific requirements and business objectives.

Do you work with startups or only enterprise clients?

While we specialize in enterprise-grade solutions, we selectively work with high-potential startups that:

  • Have sufficient funding for quality development
  • Require enterprise-level architecture from the start
  • Value craftsmanship and long-term technical excellence
  • Need complex technical solutions (AI, data engineering, cloud architecture)

Our focus is on clients who appreciate the value of doing things correctly the first time.

Getting Started

How do I start a project with Cloud Intelligence?

Starting a project is straightforward:

  1. Initial Consultation: Book a call to discuss your project and objectives
  2. Requirements Discovery: Detailed analysis of your technical and business requirements
  3. Proposal & Architecture: Comprehensive proposal with technical architecture and timeline
  4. Contract & Kickoff: Contract signing and project kickoff with your dedicated team
  5. Development: Iterative development with regular check-ins and progress updates

The entire process typically takes 1-2 weeks from initial contact to development start.

What information should I prepare for our initial consultation?

To make our consultation most effective, please prepare:

  • Business Objectives: Clear goals and success metrics for your project
  • Technical Requirements: Any specific technology preferences or constraints
  • Current Systems: Information about existing systems and integrations needed
  • Timeline: Your desired launch timeline and any critical milestones
  • Budget Range: Approximate budget range for planning purposes
  • Team Structure: Who will be involved from your side

Don't worry if you don't have all the details â€“ we'll help you refine requirements during discovery.

Do you sign NDAs and work with confidential projects?

Absolutely. We regularly work with highly confidential projects, especially in healthcare and financial services. We're happy to sign NDAs and maintain strict confidentiality throughout our engagement.

Our team is experienced with:

  • HIPAA-compliant development processes
  • Financial services security requirements
  • Enterprise-grade security and compliance
  • Secure development and deployment practices

Still Have Questions?

We're here to help! Book a consultation to discuss your specific project needs and learn how Cloud Intelligence can transform your vision into reality.
